langChange: I'll speak english from now on!
noMoney: You don't have enough **{coinName}** to afford that.
dailyAlreadyClaimed: Hey **{memberName}**, it looks like you've already picked up your daily reward!
dailyClaimed: **{memberName}**, you've been awarded {coinSymbol}**{extra1}** **{coinName}**! Don't forget to check back in tomorrow. :3
belowOrEqualToZero: The provided amount cannot be below or equal to zero.
noCoinNameSpecified: You need to specify a new name.
newCoinNameSuccess: The server's coin name now is: **{extra1}**
noCoinSymbolSpecified: You need to specify a new symbol.
newCoinSymbolSuccess: The server's coin symbol now is: **{extra1}**
firstDailyValueInvalid: The first value must be an integer.
secondDailyValueInvalid: The second value must be an integer.
dailyValuesBelowZero: None of the values can be equal or smaller to zero.
firstDailyValueBigger: The first value can't be bigger than the second value.
secondDailyValueSmaller: The second value can't be smaller than the first value.
newDailyRangeSuccess: Daily rewards range now goes between **{extra1}** and **{extra2}**.
roleAdded: The '**{extra1}**' role has been added to the role shop with the price of {coinSymbol}**{extra2} {coinName}**.
roleRemoved: The '**{extra1}**' role has been removed from the role shop.
noAdminPrivileges: You don't have the privileges to do that.
walletCommand: See your's or someone else's balance.
giveCommand: Give someone an amount of **{coinName}**. If multiple users are specified then the amount will be distributed between all of them.
shopBuyCommand: Buy a role from the role shop.
doubleCommand: If you're lucky enough, you might double what you gamble!
coinflipCommand: Leave something up to luck with a trusty coin.
rollCommand: Roll the dice. You can specify the amount of dice and sides.
dailyRangeCommand: Changes the server's daily rewards range.
addShopRoleCommand: Adds a role to the shop.
removeShopRoleCommand: Removes a role from the shop.
ruShootHelp: Try to shoot someone. If the weapon doesn't fire, you'll have to pull the trigger on your head.
ruShootmeHelp: Shoot the weapon at your head.
ruBetHelp: Place a bet of **{coinName}**. At the end of the game, the winner takes all.
ruWinsHelp: See your's or someone else's victories.
name: name
e621ResultsAmountFound: I've found {extra1} results with these tags.
ruJoin: **{memberName}** has joined the Russian Roulette game!
ruLeave: **{memberName}** has left the Russian Roulette game. Coward.
ruStart: The Russian Roulette game has begun!
ruAlreadyStarted: A game is already in progress.
ruNoGame: There is no game currently in progress.
ruNotEnoughPlayers: There are not enough players to start the game.
ruCantBet: You can't place a bet while the game is ongoing.
ruBetPlaced: **{memberName}** has bet {coinSymbol}**{extra1}** **{coinName}**! Now the winner will take home {coinSymbol}**{extra2}** **{coinName}**!
ruShootFail: **{extra1}** tried to shoot **{extra2}**, but the gun didn't fire.
ruShootYourselfSuccess: **{extra1}** pulled the trigger on their head, but nothing happened.
ruGameOver: The game is over. **{extra1}** has won! (**{extra2}** victories.)
ruNoAction: You didn't provide a valid action.
